job_tasks.phrase: Ontwerp, ontwikkel, en implementeer geavanceerde voorspellende modellen en algoritmes.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the process of creating and implementing predictive models and algorithms, which is the core of the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Je werkt aan diverse uitdagingen zoals computer vision, regressie- en classificatieproblemen, optimalisatie en natural language processing (NLP).
job_tasks.justification: This lists specific types of AI/ML problems that require model development, fitting the Modeling category.

job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkel experimenten om de technische haalbaarheid van verschillende modellen aan te tonen en om ze onderling te vergelijken.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of validating and comparing models, which is an integral part of the Modeling lifecycle.
This refers to the practical application and deployment of AI solutions, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: werk samen met diverse afdelingen om AI-oplossingen naadloos te integreren binnen onze bedrijfsprocessen.
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding business processes and integrating AI solutions, aligning with business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Kennisdeling en presentatie: deel je bevindingen en aanbevelingen met zowel technische teams als niet-technische stakeholders.
job_tasks.justification: This directly describes the communication of findings to different audiences.

job_tasks.phrase: Blijf up-to-date met de laatste trends in data science en AI, en deel deze kennis binnen het bedrijf.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes staying current with the field and sharing knowledge, indicating a need for continuous learning.

soft_skills.phrase: Kennisdeling en presentatie: deel je bevindingen en aanbevelingen met zowel technische teams als niet-technische stakeholders.
Blijf up-to-date met de laatste trends in data science en AI

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development and implementation of predictive models and algorithms, including specific tasks like regression, classification, and NLP. While there's mention of integrating AI solutions, the core focus remains on the modeling aspect rather than building user-facing applications with LLMs or diffusion models.
